item.title: My favourite Git commit
item.description: Notes Dan Carley’s commit in alphagov/govuk-puppet: Convert template to US-ASCII to fix error I introduced some tests in a feature branch to match the contents of `/etc/nginx/router_routes.conf`. They worked fine when run with `bundle exec rake spec` or `bundle exec rspec modules/router/spec`. But when run as `bundle exec rake` each should block failed with: ArgumentError: invalid byte sequence in US-ASCII I eventually found that removing the `.with_content(//)` matchers made the errors go away.
